name: Russell Weldon Laird
outside_bio: Laird previously worked as executive director of the American Trucking Associations'Agricultural and Food Transportersâ€™ Conference, which focuses on agriculture, food and commodity transportation issues. Earlier in his career, he worked on the staff of Rep. Larry Combest (R-Texas), dealing with agriculture, trade and environmental policy. He then moved to a position on the professional staff of the House Agriculture Committee, where he worked on legislation related to agricultural conservation and credit issues
bio_source: Rural Telephone Finance Company via Internet Archive
